text: The AVN Award for Best Supporting Actor is an award that has been given annually by sex industry company AVN since the award's creation in 1984. Before 2008, the award was awarded annually for two different categoriesfilm and video. From year 2009, it is awarded annually for a single category. First award was to Richard Pacheco, who was awarded at 1st AVN Awards in 1984 for his performance in Nothing to Hide. As of 2023, Randy Spears is the most awarded pornographic actor with seven awards. ==Key== Symbol Meaning Indicates that the winner won the award for two performances in that year ==Winners and nominees== ===1980s=== Year Photo Winner Movie/Video Nominees Ref(s) 1984 Richard Pacheco Nothing to Hide 1985 John Leslie Firestorm 1986 Ron Jeremy Candy Stripers II 1987 Joey Silvera She's So Fine * Robert Bullock, Sexually Altered States * Jamie Gillis, Thought You’d Never Ask * Herschel Savage, If My Mother Only Knew * Paul Thomas, Ecstasy Girls II 1988 Michael Gaunt Firestorm II 1989 Jamie Gillis Pretty Peaches II * Robert Bullock, Amanda by Night II * Billy Dee, Amanda by Night II * Mike Horner, Portrait of an Affair * Peter North, Pretty Peaches II Richard Pacheco Sensual Escape * Randy Paul, The Horneymooners * Rick Savage, Black Widow * Randy Spears, Case of the Sensuous Sinners * Ray Victory, Cat Woman ===1990s=== Year Photo Winner Movie/Video Nominee(s) Ref(s) 1990 Rick Savage The Erotic Adventures of Berman & Throbbin The Erotic Adventures of Berman & Throbbin 1991 Jon Martin Pretty Peaches 3 * Buck Adams, Radioactive * Tom Byron, Torrid Without a Cause 2 * Mike Horner, The Whore * Joey Silvera, The Whore Ron Jeremy Playin' Dirty * Buck Adams, Confessions of a Chauffeur * Jerry Butler, Steal Breeze * Jamie Gillis, Paris By Night * Mike Horner, Sex Trek 1 * Joey Silvera, Strange Curves * Randy West, New Barbarians II 1992 Jon Dough Brandy And Alexander T.
